snippet.title: Warhammer: Chaosbane - Story Trailer [ESRB US]
snippet.description:
As the threat of Chaos looms over the horizon, heroes from across the Old World must band together and drive back the Dark Gods. 

Journey across the Fantasy Battles universe with up to four friends in local and online co-op. Warhammer: Chaosbane is coming to Xbox One, PS4 and PC on June 4th, 2019.
-------------------------------
